document.full_text: a statewide grand jury in a report on tuesday harshly criticized the pennsylvania gaming control board, saying it neglected public policy aims, did not protect against illegal gaming practices and failed to maximize gaming revenue that could flow to state coffers.
document.title: grand jury report blasts pennsylvania gaming control
lines_and_colors: a statewide grand jury in a report on tuesday harshly criticized the pennsylvania gaming control board, saying it neglected public policy aims, did not protect against illegal gaming practices and failed to maximize gaming revenue that could flow to state coffers.
